    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addImageFrames(java.lang.String imageName, int frameCount, int frameVariation)
      Indicates how many frames (frameCount) a given image (imageName) is displayed, plus a variable number of frames from 1 to frameVariation (so that not all sprites of a given type animate in exactly the same way at the same time).
      void addStateImage(AnimationImage animation)

      void setTransparency(int transparency)
      Allows transparencies to be different for different sprites.

        Indicates how many frames (frameCount) a given image (imageName) is displayed, plus a variable number of frames from 1 to frameVariation (so that not all sprites of a given type animate in exactly the same way at the same time).

      • setTransparency

        public void setTransparency(int transparency)
        Allows transparencies to be different for different sprites. Default is magenta (255, 0, 255)
        Parameters:
        transparency - the transparency to set
